messages.content:
I will fight for an NHS for people not profit, and the repeal of the Coalition's damaging Health and Social Care Act. 

I will vote to scrap the cruel and unfair Bedroom Tax. 

 I will campaign for a proper Living Wage for all working people. 

I will help our young people get on in life with real training and job opportunities. 

 A fairer deal for private renters by guaranteeing longer-term tenancies and banning rip-off letting agent fees.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight for an NHS for people not profit, and repeal of the Coalition's Health and Social Care Act.
Vote to scrap the cruel and unfair Bedroom Tax.
Campaign for a proper Living Wage for all working people.
Help young people with real training and job opportunities.
A fairer deal for private renters by guaranteeing longer-term tenancies and banning rip-off letting agent fees.

leaflet.personalStatement: "I will work hard, all day, every day, to make Hornsey & Wood Green a fairer place."

images.caption: Catherine West speaking with a constituent.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet promotes Labour's policies and Catherine West's pledges, emphasising improvements to NHS, social welfare, economy, and housing.
